description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. There's an outbreak on the space military Prison Ship PPG-871! You're a simply bounty hunter trying some cash. Now it's up for you to decide: pick a side, or let chaos overtake the ship.
